title: (Fri Full Show) Brett Eldredge Is On Talking About His Christmas Tour And His New Hobbies + We Play Easy Trivia + Cheating Advice
itunes:title: (Fri Full Show) Brett Eldredge Is On Talking About His Christmas Tour And His New Hobbies + We Play Easy Trivia + Cheating Advice
description:
Brett Eldredge is on with us talking about his new Christmas tour, Glow Live, that starts soon! And find out what his new hobbies are! Then, we go around the room and play Easy Trivia and see how well the show knows each other plus other easy questions. Hear if Lunchbox remains the champion... Then, we help a listener who says she found out she's being cheated on. He swore he'd stop but she still has the feeling he still is... we give her our best advice on what she should do!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
